channel.title: CVE Feed for TanStack -- query
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TanStack -- query

item.title: CVE-2024-24558|2024-01-30T19:36:48.810Z -- TanStack -- query
item.description: TanStack Query supplies asynchronous state management, server-state utilities and data fetching for the web. The `@tanstack/react-query-next-experimental` NPM package is vulnerable to a cross-site scripting vulnerability. To exploit this, an attacker would need to either inject malicious input or arrange to have malicious input be returned from an endpoint. To fix this issue, please update to version 5.18.0 or later.
